General.Name: Armac Locacao Logistica
General.Description: Armac Locação, Logística e Serviços S.A. engages in renting heavy equipment in Brazil. It offers lift platforms, trucks, and earthmoving equipment comprising bulldozers, excavators, backhoe loaders, crawler tractors, compact track loaders, compact excavators, motor graders, road rollers, tractors, material handlers, and pavers. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Cotia, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Adib Auada, nº 35, Cotia, SP, Brazil, 06710-700
